entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
